title: Lag on my Smurf, but not my Main?
body: I decided to go on my smurf, and I have 1k ping, game crashing etc but on my main everythings normal?

replies.body: Are they on the same server?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ENI5qUOj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-08T09:55:38.304+0000)
>
> Are they on the same server?

Ya may be a different server.
